Banner.Description: I have 14 months of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I specialize in writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and occasionally in Laravel, applying good development practices and standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 14 months as a developer, I strive to learn every day. I have also worked on writing unit tests, implementing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with Laravel and MySQL. Additionally, I have led teams, showing empathy, motivating colleagues, and setting plans and goals together.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the projects I am working on.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Functional programming in templates and plugins to add necessary monitoring features.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Creation and maintenance of a second monitoring platform built in Angular, Angular Material, Laravel, MySQL, RxJS, Sass with customizable graphics, alarm system, and user management and general parameter configuration.
Planning meetings on reports.

Experience.Jobs.Title: FullStack Developer

Experience.Jobs.Title: English Teacher

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application built from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also includes reactive form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Your Super Plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plan estimator with an advanced search engine. Plans are displayed based on user age, monthly income, and location. Features include live chat, contact form, notification system via WhatsApp and email, auth, and admin role-based internet information management.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform for water wells, tugboats, and various installations built from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with OpenLayers. It also includes reactive form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It includes the use of services, interfaces, and components.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API to view country lists, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also includes a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.
